oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Jimmie Rodgers Memorial Day - 1953-05-26 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of a WSM program featuring recordings of speeches and performances from the Jimmie Rodgers Memorial Day celebration, held in Meridian, Mississippi on 1953-05-26. Program announcer is Grant Turner. Features recordings of speeches by Hank Snow, Jimmie Davis, Carrie Rodgers, and Frank Clement; and performances by Hank Snow, Jimmie Rodgers Snow, Minnie Pearl, and Carl Smith.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Jimmie Rodgers Snow; Minnie Pearl; Little Jimmy Dickens; Carl Smith
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces the Jimmie Rodgers Memorial Day concert recording -- When Jimmie Rodgers Said Goodbye (Hank Snow, Jimmie Rodgers Snow) -- Grant Turner introduces the next concert recording segment -- Eddie Hill introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Jealous Hearted Me (Minnie Pearl) -- Grant Turner introduces the next concert recording segment -- A-Sleepin' At The Foot Of The Bed (Little Jimmy Dickens) -- Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Carl Smith -- Just Wait Till I Get You Alone (Carl Smith) -- Grant Turner introduces the final concert recording segment -- Anniversary Blue Yodel (Blue Yodel No. 7) (Hank Snow)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Rodgers, Jimmie, 1897-1933; Snow, Hank; Davis, Jimmie, 1899-2000; Rodgers, Carrie; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Clement, Frank Goad; Peer, Ralph Sylvester, 1892-1960; Snow, Jimmie Rodgers; Minnie Pearl; Hill, Eddie, 1921-1994; Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Dickens, Little Jimmy, 1920-
